writer.name: 米开朗基罗·弗兰马汀诺 Michelangelo Frammartino

director.name: 米开朗基罗·弗兰马汀诺 Michelangelo Frammartino

introduction: Wrapping the audience in waves of sound, Alberi takes us on a circular journey through the Italian countryside. The marvelous natural music at the tops of the eponymous trees makes way for the rhythmic cadence of civilization--men baring axes and the natural clatter of daily life--before their unforgettable return home from the forest. The singular artistry of director Michelangelo Frammartino (Le quatro volte) is beautifully displayed in this mesmerizing homage to nature
